item.title: JVM Profiling Disclosures
item.description: Well, I’ve never actually given importance to the term ”profiling” till a few days ago. The real deal was that I was just too lazy to actually run a profiler and then to try interpret the stats and hopefully find the bottleneck in the code. So to avoid all this hassle, I tried to be careful while writing code to make sure I don’t leave any open doors for memory leaks or poor CPU utilization.
